data.name: Prov Co privateering
data.desc: King grants, by word of mouth before Judge of Admiralty, Prov Co freedom to undertake reprisals against Spanish
data.agents_nsp0: Charles I, Henry Martin, John Pym
data.prim_n: [missg] CSPC 1 [January 1636 -- Janu. 29.] / CO 124/2 f 240 / CO 1/8 ff 222-223 [No. 86] / SANTA_FE,L.223 [Maldonado a SM a 24 nov 1636]
data.note: May 1636 Capt Robert Hunt apptd Gov and [first] Capt Gen of Prov, ordered to refit Prov Co shallops to interdict Sp trade /v Genkins 86 /CO 124/1
